subNode:value.scalar:string: Where customers send messages from the order page.
Never send emails (may be useful for test purpose)
Use PHP mail() function. Recommended; works in most cases
Set my own SMTP parameters. For advanced users ONLY
Fully qualified domain name (keep this field empty if you don't know).
IP address or server name (e.g. smtp.mydomain.com)
<div class="margin-form"><input type="button" class="button" name="btEmailTest" id="btEmailTest" value="

scalar:array.comment: // We don't want to update the shop e-mail when sending test e-mails

subNode:value.scalar:string: You must define an SMTP server and an SMTP port. If you do not know it, use the PHP mail() function instead.
